brand_summary: Quilt operates in the sustainable HVAC industry, delivering modular, energy-efficient heating and cooling systems that harness renewable power and circular materials to slash carbon footprints and lower utility costs. We serve eco-conscious homeowners, architects, developers and facility managers who demand healthy, cost-effective indoor climates. Tone Tags: Sustainable Precision, Warm Intelligence. Cultural Space: Climate-positive living, smart home ecosystems and energy democracy.

primary_ideas.expanded_core_idea: Quilt’s modular architecture lets homes grow or shrink HVAC capacity on demand.
Real-time data from integrated sensors continuously tunes performance to save energy.
By pairing solar and storage with climate control, Quilt eliminates home emissions.
Every component is designed for reuse, driving waste out of the HVAC lifecycle.

controversial_ideas.expanded_core_idea: High upfront cost funds superior eco-materials and guarantees unmatched longevity.
Time-limited modules force biannual upgrades, accelerating R&D and reducing legacy waste.
